briefdescription.para: [Shortcut to: SteamVR_Input_Sources.Any] Returns true if the action has been changed since the previous update
[Shortcut to: SteamVR_Input_Sources.Any] Returns true if the action was changed for the previous update cycle
[Shortcut to: SteamVR_Input_Sources.Any] The time the action was changed (Time.realtimeSinceStartup)
[Shortcut to: SteamVR_Input_Sources.Any] The time the action was updated (Time.realtimeSinceStartup)
[Shortcut to: SteamVR_Input_Sources.Any] The handle to the component that triggered the action to be changed
[Shortcut to: SteamVR_Input_Sources.Any] The handle to the component that triggered the action to be changed in the previous update
[Shortcut to: SteamVR_Input_Sources.Any] The input source that triggered the action to be changed
[Shortcut to: SteamVR_Input_Sources.Any] The device index (used by Render Models) used by the device that triggered the action to be changed
[Shortcut to: SteamVR_Input_Sources.Any] The name of the component on the render model that caused the action to be changed (not localized)
[Shortcut to: SteamVR_Input_Sources.Any] The full localized name for the component, controller, and hand that caused the action to be changed
[Should not be called by user code] Updates the data for all the input sources the system has detected need to be updated.
The name of the component on the render model that caused the action to be updated (not localized)

parameterdescription.para: The device you would like to get data from. Any if the action is not device specific.

briefdescription.para: The input source that triggered the action to be updated last

parameterdescription.para: The device you would like to get data from. Any if the action is not device specific.

briefdescription.para: Gets the device index for the controller this action is bound to. This can be used for render models or the pose tracking system.

parameterdescription.para: The device you would like to get data from. Any if the action is not device specific.

briefdescription.para: Indicates whether or not the data for this action and specified input source has changed since the last update. Determined by SteamVR or 'changeTolerance'.

parameterdescription.para: The device you would like to get data from. Any if the action is not device specific.

briefdescription.para: The time the action was changed (Time.realtimeSinceStartup)

parameterdescription.para: The device you would like to get data from. Any if the action is not device specific.

briefdescription.para: Gets the localized name of the device that the action corresponds to. Include as many EVRInputStringBits as you want to add to the localized string

listitem.para: VRInputString_Hand - Which hand the origin is in. ex: "Left Hand".
VRInputString_ControllerType - What kind of controller the user has in that hand. ex: "Vive Controller".
VRInputString_InputSource - What part of that controller is the origin. ex: "Trackpad".
VRInputString_All - All of the above. ex: "Left Hand Vive Controller Trackpad".

briefdescription.para: Gets the localized full name of the device that the action was updated by. ex: "Left Hand Vive Controller Trackpad"

parameterdescription.para: The device you would like to get data from. Any if the action is not device specific.

briefdescription.para: [Should not be called by user code] Returns whether the system has determined this source should be updated (based on code calls) Should only be used if you've set SteamVR_Action.startUpdatingSourceOnAccess to false.

parameterdescription.para: The device you would like to get data from. Any if the action is not device specific.

briefdescription.para: [Should not be called by user code] Forces the system to start updating the data for this action and the specified input source. Should only be used if you've set SteamVR_Action.startUpdatingSourceOnAccess to false.

parameterdescription.para: The device you would like to get data from. Any if the action is not device specific.

briefdescription.para: In actions are all input type actions. Boolean, Single, Vector2, Vector3, Skeleton, and Pose.
